com.facebook.buck.counters

Class CounterInfo.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.counters.CounterInfo.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CounterInfo

    @NotThreadSafe
public static final class CounterInfo.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds instances of CounterInfo. Initialize attributes and then invoke build() method to create immutable instance.

    Builder is not thread safe and generally should not be stored in field or collection, but used immediately to create instances.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public final CounterInfo.Builder from(com.facebook.buck.counters.Counter.AbstractCounterInfo instance)
        Fill builder with attribute values from provided Counter.AbstractCounterInfo instance. Regular attribute values will be overridden, i.e. replaced with ones of an instance. Instance's absent optional values will not be copied (will not override current). Collection elements and entries will be added, not replaced.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to copy values from
        Returns:
        this builder for chained invocation

      • setCategory

        Returns:
        this builder for chained invocation

        Returns:

        Put one entry to tags map.
        Parameters:

        value - the associated value in tags map

      • putTags

        public final CounterInfo.Builder putTags(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.String> entry)
        Put one entry to tags map. Nulls are not permitted
        Parameters:
        entry - the key and value entry
        Returns:
        this builder for chained invocation

        public final CounterInfo.Builder setTags(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.String> entries)

        Returns:
